attributes.action: pay the demanded ransom for the immediate return of Rachael and Paul Chandler.  The Foreign and Commonwealth Office must act to obtain the release of this innocent British couple now.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr and Mrs Chandler are paying a heavy price to maintain the high moral ground of the FCO.  This is not how it is meant to work.  The FCO is there to protect British citizens.  It is high time they started doing their job! The Chandlers have a right to the protection of their government, whatever the cost.

rejection.details: Due to the current sensitive nature of this matter, we are not currently accepting petitions on this subject.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
